title: Setup e911 Address for VoIP Service
description: A customer with a VoIP (internet phone) service needs to set or update their e911 address for emergency services.

tasks.description: Explain the importance of an accurate e911 address for VoIP services.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates why this is a critical setting.

tasks.description: Guide the customer to the online portal where they can update their e911 address.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides clear instructions to find the correct page.

tasks.description: Verify in the system that the e911 address has been successfully updated by the customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent checks the system and confirms the new address is saved.
